news_header: Pope Francis, 88, is hospitalized due to a complex clinical situation involving a polymicrobial infection of his respiratory tract, requiring a change in treatment.
news_original_title: Pope's health a 'complex clinical situation', Vatican says
news_text: He has been experiencing bronchitis symptoms and was admitted to Gemelli hospital for tests. The Vatican reports his condition is stable, but he needs complete rest for recovery. He has missed public events and has a history of health issues.
